name: Katekarin
description:
I know..you are tired from clicker games....everithing is the same.....clicking....BUT! THIS IS NOT THE OTHER CLICKER GAME You must thing WHERE CLICK AND WHEN CLICK.

You can click in 3 zones: Top, Right, Left, in this 3 zones your enemy can block. If you succesful hit the enemy you get energy(Gold is too mainstream)from energy you can buy upgrades in the shop: Drones, Cannons etc.

I also create combo system:If You reach some level you unlock combo which gifts a lot of damage to your enemy.

I hope You enjoy my first android game at least a bit.
